      • withCurrentUserAsCreateUser

        public MetroReportBuilder withCurrentUserAsCreateUser()
        The Metro report pre-update rules rely on having the create user set, so that they can check that the requesting user has all required fields (e.g. first name, last name, email address, primary phone) set. This method allows the create user to be explicitly set to the current user before the bundle is committed. Note that the create user is always set automatically by the bundle commit, so the value set here will be overwritten later in the commit (though almost certainly by exactly the same user).
        Returns:
        the modified builder
